      • openConnection

        public void openConnection(ModelAddress sender,
                  Map<String,Object> connectParameters)
        This implementation immediately delegates to an actor pool and executes asynchronously. Although executing in parallel the actor pool makes sure that "open" requests from the same sender are handled serially in the correct order.
        Specified by:
        openConnection in interface Switchboard
        Parameters:
        sender - ModelAddress that request the connection
        connectParameters - criteria for the RoutingLogic to find the proper receiver

      • send

        public void send(ModelAddress sender,
        EventMessage message)
        This implementation immediately delegates to an actor pool and executes asynchronously. Although executing in parallel the actor pool makes sure that "send" requests from the same sender are handled serially in the correct order.
        Specified by:
        send in interface Switchboard
        Parameters:
        sender - ModelAddress that sends the EventMessage
        message - an EventMessage

      • send

        public void send(ModelAddress sender,
        EventMessage message,
        ModelAddress receiver)
        This implementation immediately delegates to an actor pool and executes asynchronously. Although executing in parallel the actor pool makes sure that "send" requests to the same receiver are handled serially in the correct order.
        Specified by:
        send in interface Switchboard
        Parameters:
        sender - ModelAddress that sends the EventMessage
        message - an EventMessage
        receiver - ModelAddress that shall receive the EventMessage

      • closeAllConnections

        public void closeAllConnections(ModelAddress sender)
        This implementation immediately delegates to an actor pool and executes asynchronously. Although executing in parallel the actor pool makes sure that "close" requests from the same sender are handled serially in the correct order.
        Specified by:
        closeAllConnections in interface Switchboard
        Parameters:
        sender - ModelAddress that wants to close connections

      • closeQualifyingConnections

        public void closeQualifyingConnections(ModelAddressQualifier senderQualifier)
        Description copied from interface: Switchboard
        Close the connections to all currently connected receivers of all qualifying senders.
        Specified by:
        closeQualifyingConnections in interface Switchboard
        Parameters:
        senderQualifier - qualifier

      • closeConnection

        public void closeConnection(ModelAddress sender,
                   ModelAddress receiver)
        This implementation immediately delegates to an actor pool and executes asynchronously. Although executing in parallel the actor pool makes sure that "close" requests to the same receiver are handled serially in the correct order.
        Specified by:
        closeConnection in interface Switchboard
        Parameters:
        sender - ModelAddress that wants to close the connection
        receiver - ModelAddress that shall be informed about the closing of the connection

      • start

        public void start()
        Description copied from interface: Switchboard
        Start switching and accept "open", "send" and "close" requests. Calling one of the "open", "send", or "close" methods before starting will result in an IllegalStateException.
        Specified by:
        start in interface Switchboard

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Description copied from interface: Switchboard
        Disconnect all addresses and stop switching. Calling one of the "open", "send", or "close" methods after stopping will result in an IllegalStateException.
        Specified by:
        stop in interface Switchboard
